description.value:
Prerequisite: 11th level, drow, darkfire racial power

Benefit: When you use your darkfire racial power, you can alter its effects to grant the target a +2 bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn.

Update (2/8/2010)

In the Benefit entry, delete "saving throws." The text is incorrect.

Published in Dragon Magazine 367, page(s) 38.
